question: What is the theme of the 2019 edition of International Day of Peace?
option2: Partnerships for Peace – Dignity for All
option4: Together for Peace: Respect, Safety and Dignity for All
explanation: The International Day of Peace is observed every year on 21st of September to commemorate and  strengthen the ideals of peace both within and among all nations and peoples. The theme for Year 2019 “Climate Action for Peace” is to draw attention to the importance of combating climate change as a way to protect and promote peace throughout the world.
